A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Before walking into the cinema like most star wars fans I had expectations and granted this movie definitely is not perfect\, however for me I found tlj to be refreshing and I'm even more excited now to see what they do for ix. I hated how they handled Finn's character which to me kinda felt like they didn't know what to do with him that they just decided to come up with some bs from no where\, visually I liked the casino stuff but it felt forced. The throne room however... omg so good and this part makes up for Canto Bight.
